Author: PM_ME_YER_SHIBA_INUS
Text: Hey. Worried about you.  If you can grab some good liquid drinks, could it be easier to convince yourself to have more? Maintenance would be ideal, but man, even just putting some brakes on would be better than freefalling.  I outweighed you by *dozens* of lbs, I'm 5 inches taller, and I still didn't need to lose much more in a month before it nuked my gallbladder.
